content_profile.title: Creator tools you can build that will print money

key_takeaways: Solution: Create AI-powered curation and moderation system for creator applications (Difficulty: advanced)
Growth Tactic: Build multiple SEO-optimized mini tools (Channel: seo)
AI Workflow: AI-powered creator curation and ranking
Strategy: Build 40+ SEO-optimized mini tools to drive traffic
Strategy: Use free mini tools to sell main product

startup_ideas.title: Reverse marketplace - Link tree for brands instead of creators
startup_ideas.target_market: Brands wanting creator partnerships and creators seeking sponsorships
startup_ideas.problem_solved: Brands missing out on good creators, creators struggling to find relevant brand partnerships
startup_ideas.business_model: Take a percentage cut on sponsorship deals
startup_ideas.validation: Tweet Hunter's sponsorship page received hundreds of applications when announced

market_gaps.title: Brands struggle to find and vet quality creators for sponsorships
market_gaps.solution_approach: Create AI-powered curation and moderation system for creator applications

trend_opportunities.title: B2B creator economy growth
trend_opportunities.opportunity: Focus on B2B creators rather than traditional influencers for sponsorship platforms
